description.narrative: Cluster partners, stakeholders in Bangladesh, NEA and the EKN in Dhaka.

Ensuring smooth project progress, including: coordinating all activities according to pre-agreed goals and timelines, identifying goals and needs of cluster partners, stakeholders in Bangladesh, NEA and the EKN in Dhaka, liason (lobby, identify and follow up opportunities) in Bangladesh, facilitate sharing of lessons learned between the Consortium partners.

Larive International, in close cooperation with its partner office in Bangladesh, LightCastle Partners, coorinate the project. This includes coordinating all activities according to pre-agreed goals and timelines, stakeholder communication, identifying needs and managing expectations of cluster partners, stakeholders in Bangladesh, NEA and the EKN in Dhaka, reporting on project progress, taking care of financial and administrative compliance, providing local support/liaison in Bangladesh and coordinating and communicating with collaboration partners.
